Docs.summary: Gets the estimated target time at which the next frame of an animation will be rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that is returned reflects the same value as the animation system. This is the same time used by the time manager. For more information, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](../Topic/Animation%20and%20Timing%20System%20Overview.md).
